TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SubMenuStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style implements class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor
Public Class SubMenuStyle Inherits Style Implements ICustomTypeDescriptor
type SubMenuStyle = class inherit Style interface ICustomTypeDescriptor

summary.span: 表示 控件中子菜单的样式。

span.span: Represents the style of a submenu in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类表示控件中子菜单的样式。 Use the class to represent the style of a submenu in the control. 子菜单可在静态菜单或动态菜单中显示。A submenu can be displayed within either a static menu or a dynamic menu. 静态菜单在控件上始终可见, 而动态菜单仅在用户将鼠标指针置于包含动态子菜单的父菜单项上时显示。A static menu is always visible on a control, whereas a dynamic menu is displayed only when the user positions the mouse pointer over a parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 通过使用下表中的属性, 可以为静态菜单内的子菜单和动态菜单指定不同的样式特征 (如字体大小和颜色)。You can specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for the submenus within a static menu and a dynamic menu by using the properties in the following table. |子菜单项样式属性Submenu item style property|说明Description| |---------------------------------|-----------------| ||动态菜单中子菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a submenu within a dynamic menu.| ||静态菜单中子菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a submenu within a static menu.| 类`Style`从类继承其大部分成员。The class inherits most of its members from the `Style` class. 它通过提供`Style`控制菜单项文本周围空间量的属性来扩展类。It extends the `Style` class by providing properties that control the amount of space around a menu item's text. 使用属性可控制菜单项文本左侧和右侧的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the menu item's text. 同样, 属性控制菜单项文本上方和下方的空间量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the menu item's text. 有关继承的样式设置的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information on the inherited style settings, see . > [!NOTE] > 通过设置子菜单样式的属性,设置与子菜单关联的HTML对象的。 `z-index`Set the `z-index` of HTML objects that are associated with a submenu by setting the property of the submenu style. `z-index`特性定义呈现的 HTML 对象的堆栈顺序。The `z-index` attribute defines the stacking order of rendered HTML objects. 默认情况下, 动态菜单项将显示在具有默认 z 索引 (0) 的任何 HTML 对象的上方。By default, dynamic menu items will appear above any HTML object that has the default z-index (0). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为动态菜单内的子菜单指定自定义样式。The following example demonstrates how to specify a custom style for a submenu within a dynamic menu. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/CS/menudynamicmenustylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDynamicMenuStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDynamicMenuStyle/VB/menudynamicmenustylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建类的新实例。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 此构造函数通常在动态填充集合时使用。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection. 扩展类以初始化子菜单项样式属性 ( 如或) 时, 也使用此方法。It is also used when extending the class to initialize the submenu item style properties, such as or .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified view-state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以创建一个新的对象, 其中包含请求的视图状态中包含的信息。Use this constructor to create a new object with the information contained in the request's view state.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CopyFrom(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub CopyFrom (s As Style)

span.span: The object to copy.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性复制到 类的当前实例中。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可复制调用此方法的对象中指定对象的样式属性。 Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!CAUTION] > 类的当前实例中的所有属性都将替换为指定对象中的相应属性。All properties in the current instance of the class will be replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要在不替换任何设置值的情况下复制样式属性, 请使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any set values, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void FillStyleAttributes (System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void FillStyleAttributes(class System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection attributes, class System.Web.UI.IUrlResolutionService urlResolver) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub FillStyleAttributes (attributes As CssStyleCollection, urlResolver As IUrlResolutionService)
protected: override void FillStyleAttributes(System::Web::UI::CssStyleCollection ^ attributes, System::Web::UI::IUrlResolutionService ^ urlResolver);

param.name: attributes
param.span: 向其中添加样式属性的 对象。

span.span: The object to which to add the style properties.

param.name: urlResolver
param.span: 一个实现了 的对象，它包含当前位置 (URL) 的上下文信息。

span.span: The -implemented object that contains the context information for the current location (URL).

summary.span: 将 对象的样式属性添加到指定的 对象中。

span.span: Adds the style properties of the object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将类的当前实例的样式属性添加到指定的对象。 Use the method to add the style properties of the current instance of the class to the specified object. > [!NOTE] > 此方法仅由控件开发人员使用。This method is used only by control developers.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit HorizontalPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.HorizontalPadding : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置子菜单左侧和右侧的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of a submenu.

value.span: 子菜单文本左侧和右侧的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space to the left and right of the text of a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制子菜单项的文本与包含菜单端的文本之间的空间量。Use the property to control the amount of space between the text of the submenu item and the side of the containing menu. 若要控制子菜单项之间的垂直间距, 请使用属性。To control the vertical space between submenu items, use the property.

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

param.name: s
param.span: 与设置组合在一起的 对象。

span.span: The object to combine settings with.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象的样式属性与 类的当前实例的样式属性组合在一起。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with those of the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可将指定对象的样式属性与从中调用此方法的对象的样式属性组合在一起。 Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!CAUTION] > 此方法通过设置当前对象中未设置的每个属性及其在指定对象中的相应值来联接样式属性。This method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 仅更新尚未设置的属性。Only properties that have not been set will be updated. 如果未设置指定对象中的属性, 则不会更改当前对象中的相应属性。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将 类的当前实例返回到其原始状态。

span.span: Returns the current instance of the class to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法从状态袋中移除任何已定义的样式元素, 并将对象重置为其原始状态。 Use the method to remove any defined style elements from the state bag and reset the object to its original state.

summary.span: 获取或设置子菜单上方和下方的空间量。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below a submenu.

value.span: 子菜单上方和下方的空间量。

span.span: The amount of space above and below a submenu.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制子菜单项文本之间的垂直空间量。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space between the text of submenu items. 若要控制子菜单文本周围的水平空间, 请使用属性。To control the horizontal space around submenu text, use the property.

span.span: The selected value is of or is less than 0.
